addon:addon.name: Java223 Scripting Automation
addon:addon.description: This bundle allows using Java in JSR223 scripts.

parameter.name: scriptCacheSize
parameter.label: Script Cache Size
parameter.description: Script compilation cache size. 0 to disable. A positive number allows keeping compilation result.

parameter.name: allowInstanceReuse
parameter.label: Allow Script Instance Reuse
parameter.description: Reuse an instance if found in the cache. Allow sharing data between subsequent executions. Note: Beware of concurrency issues

parameter.name: additionalBundles
parameter.label: Additional Bundles
parameter.description: Additional bundles exported for developing, concatenated by ",".

parameter.name: additionalClasses
parameter.label: Additional Classes
parameter.description: Additional classes exported for developing, concatenated by ",".

parameter.name: stabilityGenerationWaitTime
parameter.label: Stability Generation Wait Time
parameter.description: Delay (in ms) before writing generated classes. Each new generation triggering event further delays the generation. Useful to prevent multiple code generations when many Things activate at the same times.

parameter.name: startupGuardTime
parameter.label: Startup Guard Time
parameter.description: Delay (in ms) before overwriting previously generated classes, at startup. Useful to not replace files from previous openHAB run with incomplete generation from a not fully loaded system.
